summary: CEAR, LLC is a Sacramento-based IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) and electronics recycling company founded in 2000. For over 25 years, they have served businesses, manufacturing, finance, education, healthcare, and government organizations with secure and sustainable hardware lifecycle solutions. Their core services include ITAD, secure data destruction (NAID AAA certified), and advanced electronics recycling, all performed in-house at their secure facility in Mather, California. CEAR emphasizes a circular economy, recovering valuable materials like rare earth elements from hard drives and employing innovative technologies such as centrifugal force processing that uses 30% less energy than traditional shredders. They hold key industry certifications including R2v3, NAID AAA, and multiple ISO standards, demonstrating a strong commitment to environmental responsibility, data security, and quality management. The company operates on a B2B model, providing customized, bulk solutions for enterprise clients.
